abstract: You asked for it, and here it is: the Frugal Traveler took a trip to Madison, Wis., with all the bells and whistles chosen by readers.
snippet: You asked for it, and here it is: the Frugal Traveler took a trip to Madison, Wis., with all the bells and whistles chosen by readers.
lead_paragraph: What a great idea -- if only I had thought of it: take a trip to Madison, Wis.; stay in a cozy bed- and-breakfast; get around by bike; test out burgers, brats, cheese curds and microbrews; and look for some booze to bring back home.

headline.main: My Trip to Madison: Bikes, Brews, Burgers and a B&B
